```go
package main

import (
	"github.com/pulumi/pulumi-aws/sdk/v6/go/aws/costoptimizationhub"
	"github.com/pulumi/pulumi/sdk/v3/go/pulumi"
)

func main() {
	pulumi.Run(func(ctx *pulumi.Context) error {
		_, err := costoptimizationhub.NewPreferences(ctx, "example", &costoptimizationhub.PreferencesArgs{
			MemberAccountDiscountVisibility: pulumi.String("None"),
			SavingsEstimationMode:           pulumi.String("AfterDiscounts"),
		})
		if err != nil {
			return err
		}
		return nil
	})
}
```
</pulumi-choosable>
</div>

<pulumi-choosable type="language" values="java">

```java
package generated_program;

import com.pulumi.Context;
import com.pulumi.Pulumi;
import com.pulumi.core.Output;
import com.pulumi.aws.costoptimizationhub.Preferences;
import com.pulumi.aws.costoptimizationhub.PreferencesArgs;
import java.util.List;
import java.util.ArrayList;
import java.util.Map;
import java.io.File;
import java.nio.file.Files;
import java.nio.file.Paths;

public class App {
    public static void main(String[] args) {
        Pulumi.run(App::stack);
    }

    public static void stack(Context ctx) {
        var example = new Preferences("example", PreferencesArgs.builder()
            .memberAccountDiscountVisibility("None")
            .savingsEstimationMode("AfterDiscounts")
            .build());

    }
}
```
</pulumi-choosable>
</div>
<div>
<pulumi-choosable type="language" values="yaml">

```yaml
resources:
  example:
    type: aws:costoptimizationhub:Preferences
    properties:
      memberAccountDiscountVisibility: None
      savingsEstimationMode: AfterDiscounts
```
</pulumi-choosable>

## Preferences Resource Properties {#properties}

To learn more about resource properties and how to use them, see [Inputs and Outputs](/docs/intro/concepts/inputs-outputs) in the Architecture and Concepts docs.

### Inputs

<pulumi-choosable type="language" values="python">
<p>
In Python, inputs that are objects can be passed either as <a href="/docs/languages-sdks/python/#inputs-and-outputs">argument classes or as dictionary literals</a>.
</p>
</pulumi-choosable>

The Preferences resource accepts the following [input](/docs/intro/concepts/inputs-outputs) properties:



<div>
<pulumi-choosable type="language" values="csharp">
<dl class="resources-properties"><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="memberaccountdiscountvisibility_csharp">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#memberaccountdiscountvisibility_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Member<wbr>Account<wbr>Discount<wbr>Visibility</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>Customize whether the member accounts can see the &quot;After Discounts&quot; savings estimates. Valid values are <code>All</code> and <code>None</code>. Default value is <code>All</code>.</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="savingsestimationmode_csharp">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#savingsestimationmode_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Savings<wbr>Estimation<wbr>Mode</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>Customize how estimated monthly savings are calculated. Valid values are <code>BeforeDiscounts</code> and <code>AfterDiscounts</code>. Default value is <code>BeforeDiscounts</code>.</dd></dl>
</pulumi-choosable>
</div>

<div>
<pulumi-choosable type="language" values="go">
<dl class="resources-properties"><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="memberaccountdiscountvisibility_go">

</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>Customize whether the member accounts can see the &quot;After Discounts&quot; savings estimates. Valid values are <code>All</code> and <code>None</code>. Default value is <code>All</code>.</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="savingsestimationmode_go">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#savingsestimationmode_go" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Savings<wbr>Estimation<wbr>Mode</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>Customize how estimated monthly savings are calculated. Valid values are <code>BeforeDiscounts</code> and <code>AfterDiscounts</code>. Default value is <code>BeforeDiscounts</code>.</dd></dl>
</pulumi-choosable>
</div>

<div>
<pulumi-choosable type="language" values="yaml">
<dl class="resources-properties"><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="state_memberaccountdiscountvisibility_yaml">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#state_memberaccountdiscountvisibility_yaml" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">member<wbr>Account<wbr>Discount<wbr>Visibility</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">String</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>Customize whether the member accounts can see the &quot;After Discounts&quot; savings estimates. Valid values are <code>All</code> and <code>None</code>. Default value is <code>All</code>.</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="state_savingsestimationmode_yaml">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#state_savingsestimationmode_yaml" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">savings<wbr>Estimation<wbr>Mode</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">String</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>Customize how estimated monthly savings are calculated. Valid values are <code>BeforeDiscounts</code> and <code>AfterDiscounts</code>. Default value is <code>BeforeDiscounts</code>.</dd></dl>
</pulumi-choosable>
</div>
</pulumi-choosable>
</div>






## Import



Using `pulumi import`, import Cost Optimization Hub Preferences using the `id`. For example:

```sh
$ pulumi import aws:costoptimizationhub/preferences:Preferences example 111222333444
```


To learn more about importing existing cloud resources, see [Importing resources](/docs/using-pulumi/adopting-pulumi/import/).
